articles.author: Nidal Al-Mughrabi
articles.description: Israeli forces widened their raid into northern Gaza, and tanks reached the north edge of Gaza City, pounding some districts of the Sheikh Radwan neighborhood, residents said, forcing many families to leave their homes.
articles.title: Israeli tanks deepen their push into the northern Gaza Strip

articles.author: Jasper Ward
articles.description: The United States said on Sunday it will send to Israel an advanced anti-missile system - and U.S. troops to operate it - in a bid to bolster the country's air defenses following missile attacks by Iran.
articles.title: US to send anti-missile system to Israel, says Pentagon

articles.author: Hyunsu Yim, Jack Kim
articles.description: North Korea is getting ready to blow up roads that cross the heavily militarised border with South Korea, Seoul said on Monday, amid an escalating war of words after the North accused its rival of sending drones over its capital Pyongyang.
articles.title: North Korea set to blow up cross-border roads with South amid drone row, Seoul says

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: The man, arrested on Saturday, was charged with possession of a loaded firearm and possession of a high-capacity magazine.
articles.title: Man arrested near Trump rally in California on gun charges

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: China's military started a new round of war games near Taiwan on Monday, saying it was a warning to the "separatist acts of Taiwan independence forces", and offered no date for when they may conclude.
articles.title: China starts new round of war games near Taiwan, offers no end date

articles.author: Gerry Doyle
articles.description: Washington may need ‘deterrence by punishment’ to counter China’s missiles, says one analyst.
articles.title: Lessons from Iran missile attacks for defending against China's advanced arsenal

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Some 30,415 people including nearly 8,000 children have been evacuated from areas bordering Ukraine due to shelling and attacks, Russia's human rights commissioner said in remarks published on Monday.
articles.title: Russia says more than 30,000 evacuated from areas bordering Ukraine

articles.author: Kate Lamb, Ananda Teresia
articles.description: In 2014, then presidential hopeful and outsider Joko Widodo attended packed campaigns with a white ribbon warning against election fraud tied around his head.
articles.title: A decade of Jokowi: Indonesia's democracy icon leaves illiberal legacy, critics say

articles.author: Mandy Leong, Hasnoor Hussein, Rozanna Latiff
articles.description: Patches of palm thatch entwined with a few forlorn stilts sticking out of the emerald waters in a Malaysian marine park off the island of Borneo are the only traces remaining of the homes of hundreds of sea nomads.
articles.title: Malaysia's eviction of sea nomads casts light on precarious lives

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: The Israeli military ordered residents of 23 southern Lebanese villages on Saturday to evacuate to areas north of the Awali River, which flows from the western Bekaa Valley into the Mediterranean.
articles.title: Israel orders evacuation of more southern Lebanese towns amid rising displacement
